title: Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
description: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should confirm that the output directory can be deleted then rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder at a bin directory which contains more than just .class files that can be rebuilt from the available .java files.
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, the confirmation message about the deletion and rebuilding of the output directory is not displayed.
EB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, a confirmation message should be displayed, indicating that the output directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project for an existing directory structure. 
2. Verify that no confirmation message is shown about the deletion and rebuilding of the output directory.
